Class FileInfoPersistanceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.atakmap.android.filesharing.android.service.FileInfoPersistanceHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class FileInfoPersistanceHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Tables: (all same schema) transferFileinfo: Files available for download savedFileinfo: Files saved by user, not yet available for download
